bibl.title: Archival Archaeology of Early Ptolemaic Theban Papyri and Ostraca.
bibl.note: The archaeological contexts of early Ptolemaic Theban material through 'archival archaeology'. - I. Papyri acquired during Khedival rule (1805-1882). - II. Papyri acquired during the British Protectorate (1882-1922). - III. Papyri acquired during the Egyptian Kingdom (1922-1952). - IV. Ostraca acquired during Khedival rule (1805-1882). - V. Ostraca acquired during the British Protectorate (1882-1922). - VI. Ostraca acquired during the Egyptian Kingdom (1922-1952).
